attributes.action: British Nationals should be able to retain their EU citizenship after 'Brexit'.
attributes.additional_details:
This would have no effect on the process of leaving the EU which would still go ahead as planned.
It is likely that those 'opting in' will have to pay a fee to cover administration costs etc.
attributes.background:
Millions of Britons travel to Europe freely and easily each year for work and business, to visit friends and relatives, or for a holiday or short break.
Associate Citizenship would ensure that UK citizens could continue to enjoy these freedoms and benefits after the UK leaves the EU.
